about.title: About Us
about.content: HGM Software aims to effectively manage developing technology and commerce both in our country and around the world. Our "Business Management System" software is designed to optimize business processes, increase efficiency, and provide a user-friendly experience. As the HGM Software family, we are committed to providing quality service to our customers. We are excited and pleased to step into the future with you and to offer you the best service. Best regards, HGM Software

mission.title: Mission
mission.content: As HGM Software, our mission is to optimize business processes and increase efficiency by providing our customers with innovative and effective software solutions. By using technology effectively, we aim to help our customers achieve their business goals.

vision.title: Vision
vision.content: Our vision is to make HGM Software a global software leader and to provide our customers with the highest quality service. In the future, we aim to create a world full of technological innovations and contribute to the success of our customers.

chairperson.title: Message from the Chairperson
chairperson.message: HGM Software's Valuable Business Partners, Dear Friends and Employees; As the HGM Software Community, we firmly believe that our principle of 'Digital Solutions, Stronger Tomorrows' will bring us the success of becoming a preferred brand. We will experience the happiness of being one of the most admired and respected institutions through our activities both domestically and internationally. From today onward, we will continue our journey by raising the bar even higher, embracing innovations and changes. While staying true to our core values, we will continuously renew and develop our strategies, business lines, and organization to remain the most solid, reliable, and profitable.

career.title: Join Our Team
career.content: At our company, we believe in fostering a collaborative and innovative work environment. We are always on the lookout for talented individuals to join our team. If you are passionate about technology and eager to make a difference, we would love to hear from you.

positions.title: Backend Developer
positions.description: We are looking for a skilled Backend Developer to join our team. You will be responsible for managing the interchange of data between the server and the users.
positions.requirements: Experience with Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. Knowledge of RESTful APIs.

positions.title: Junior DevOps Engineer
positions.description: Join our team as a Junior DevOps Engineer. You will assist in managing our infrastructure and ensuring smooth deployment processes.
positions.requirements: Familiarity with Docker, Kubernetes, and CI/CD pipelines.

positions.title: Frontend Developer
positions.description: We need a talented Frontend Developer to create amazing user experiences. You should be proficient in React and have a keen eye for design.
positions.requirements: Experience with React, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Knowledge of responsive design.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: We believe in creating a collaborative and innovative work environment. We are always looking for talented individuals who want to join our team. If you are passionate about technology and want to make a difference, we would love to hear from you.
